id.kaytrust.core.credential.base

Interface CredentialValidation

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    EthereumCredentialValidation
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EthereumCredentialValidationImpl

    public interface CredentialValidation
    This interface defines validation methods that are performed in order to check if a credential has been correctly issued by some entity/person/organization.

    Here is an example of a verifiable credential format: 

    
 {
 "@context":
 		["https://www.w3.org/2018/credentials/v1","https://schema.org/"],
 	"type":
 		["VerifiableCredential","MyCustomType"],
 	"issuer":
 		"did:ev:cwMLEaTrUmAijtfCEtTY5J1KxmzDUJfw4eqeN",
 	"issuanceDate":"2020-08-24T23:53:43-05:00",
 	"credentialSubject":
 		{"@id":
 			"did:ev:cwMLLiMQGm9EaTqzY2k58refSoXdTsYvJ9Znp",
 			"name":"John Doe",
 			"birthDate":"2018-01-01"
 		},
 	"proof":
 		{
 		"type":"EthereumAttestationRegistry2019",
 		"networkId":"0x9e551",
 		"contractAddress":"0x85319cdf4d0a89a4b39dab881659a653116abb31"
 		}
 	}
    Verifiable credentials are compliant with W3C
    Author:
    Edgard Espinoza, Erick Pacheco

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void loadProofType(List<ProofTypeBuilder> proofTypes)
      Loads the ProofTypeBuilder implementation, it is intended to be loaded at the beginning of an instantiation of a specific implementation of this interface.
      CheckProof verifyCredential(String vc, String issuer)
      Checks a verifiable credential validity.

    • Method Detail

      • loadProofType

        void loadProofType(List<ProofTypeBuilder> proofTypes)
        Loads the ProofTypeBuilder implementation, it is intended to be loaded at the beginning of an instantiation of a specific implementation of this interface.
        Parameters:
        proofTypes - list of proof types supported

      • verifyCredential

        CheckProof verifyCredential(String vc,
                            String issuer)
                     throws UnsupportedProofTypeException,
                            MnidInvalidAddressException,
                            IOException,
                            ParamEmptyException
        Checks a verifiable credential validity.
        Parameters:
        vc - The verifiable credential to check
        issuer - issuer who emit the credential DID, The Decentralized identifier
        Returns:
        true if the credential is valid, false otherwise
        Throws:
        UnsupportedProofTypeException - proof type unsupported
        IOException - network exception
        MnidInvalidAddressException - mnid format error
        ParamEmptyException - if a required parameter is empty.
